system.descriptionText:
Gain either Die Hard or Paranoia Talents. Gain Inquiry Skill (or increase by one level).
You Brook no Insult, if someone insults you or bismirches your honour, you react violently. You may take a Willpower Test to avert this, difficulty modified by GM.
